Government of Canada Tender Transition Services [English] #18-MER-SCC-2023
Government of Canada Tender Transition Services [French] #18-MER-SCC-2023
Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
Reference Number: PW-23-01028241
Solicitation #21206-24-4308665
Closing Date: March 16, 2023 at 13:00 AST
Location: Atlantic Institution, New Brunswick, Canada

## Services Intended
Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) to provide Elder Services for Indigenous offenders within the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) system.

## Procurement Information
* The procurement is a set-aside for Indigenous Suppliers, under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).
* Interested firms can submit a statement of capability on or before the closing date.
* The selected supplier will provide Elder services to Indigenous offenders to promote healing and balance through ceremonial and spiritual activities.

## Statement of Capability
Firms interested in bidding must meet the following requirements:
* Be recognized as an Elder and possess a minimum five (5) years of experience acquired in the past 10 years prior to the closing date in delivering spiritual and cultural services and teachings to Indigenous people.
* Be familiar with and able to conduct various ceremonies with a focus on healing according to own teachings.

## Tender Information
* The contract is for a period of one year, with an option to extend for two additional one-year periods.
* Estimated contract value is $267,941.71 (GST/HST extra).

## Elaboration
The CSC is seeking a contractor to provide Elder services, which includes teacing spiritual and cultural values to Indigenous offenders. The successful contractor will perform the work at Atlantic Institution, Renous, New Brunswick, and will be responsible for submitting progress reports to CSC on a monthly basis. The closing date for a statement of capability is March 16, 2023, at 13:00 AST.

Suppliers can submit their statements of capability electronically or by mail, to the address provided above.

For inquiries and further information, please contact Claudia Landry, Regional Contract Officer at (506) 378-8722.
